Articles.Content:
I've got probably >1000h in KSP but I haven't played in 10 months or so. Could someone please tell me where exactly is the subassembly button (the one which you use to save your subassembly)? I think it was moved since 0.25.

Thanks in advance!
You have to expand the "advanced" categories in the VAB (top left sort of arrow I think) and it is the last category

"Advanced" button looks like: <<<<<

Subassemblies is green button.
Okay and then just drag and drop the booster there, is this correct?
Yeah it has a space toward the bottom that says "Drag and Drop Subassemblies here." I missed it the first few tries.
